13 // If we are running documentation we will not include the platform directives
14 // and pretend this running under Unix based platform in order to pick up the
15 // c++ 11 style types for documentation
16 #ifdef IN_DOXYGEN
17  #define CHAOS_OS_UNIX

106 
107  // typedef the windows types
108  typedef signed __int8 int8;
109  typedef unsigned __int8 uint8;
110  typedef signed __int16 int16;
111  typedef unsigned __int16 uint16;
112  typedef signed __int32 int32;
113  typedef unsigned __int32 uint32;
114  typedef signed __int64 int64;
115  typedef unsigned __int64 uint64;
116 
117 #else
118 
119  // the platform has not been recognised, naive underlying types will have to
120  // be used, and we will hope for the best.
121  typedef signed char int8;
122  typedef unsigned char uint8;
123  typedef signed short int16;
124  typedef unsigned short uint16;
125  typedef signed int int32;
126  typedef unsigned int uint32;
